GetAdbVersion.summary: Ask the ADB server for its internal version number.

KillAdb.summary: Ask the ADB server to quit immediately. This is used when the ADB client detects that an obsolete server is running after an upgrade.

GetDevices.summary: Gets the devices that are available for communication.
GetDevices.returns: A list of devices that are connected.

CreateForward.summary: Asks the ADB server to forward local connections from to the address on the .
CreateForward.param: The device to which to forward the connections.

param.name: local
param.para: The local address to forward. This value can be in one of:

list.item: local:<path>: Unix local domain socket on <path>

param.name: remote
param.para: The remote address to forward. This value can be in one of:

list.item: tcp:<port>: TCP connection on localhost:<port> on device
local:<path>: Unix local domain socket on <path> on device
jdwp:<pid>: JDWP thread on VM process <pid> on device.

RemoveForward.summary: Remove a port forwarding between a local and a remote port.
RemoveForward.param: The device on which to remove the port forwarding
Specification of the local port that was forwarded

RemoveAllForwards.summary: Removes all forwards for a given device.
RemoveAllForwards.param: The device on which to remove the port forwarding

ListForward.summary: List all existing forward connections from this server.
ListForward.param: The device for which to list the existing foward connections.
ListForward.returns: A entry for each existing forward connection.

RunLogService.summary: Runs the Event log service on the Device.
RunLogService.param: Optionally, the names of the logs to receive.
RunLogService.returns: An enumerator which enumerates all the log entries.

Reboot.summary: Reboots the specified device in to the specified mode.
Reboot.param: The mode into which to reboot the device.

Connect.summary: Connect to a device via TCP/IP.
Connect.param: The DNS endpoint at which the adb server on the device is running.
Connect.returns: A string with the adb server response message
